headline: Pawzzle: Guess the Breed Edition
excerpt: Immerse yourself in a captivating word game that combines the excitement of guessing with a love for dogs, challenging players to identify mystery dog breeds in a unique and enjoyable gaming experience.
author: Pam Pragides

headline: Barky Bones
excerpt: Your local pet haven provides a diverse range of premium products and personalized care, ensuring every furry friend receives the attention and quality they deserve.
author: Pam Pragides

headline: TravelSite: A New Horizon for Travel Enthusiasts
excerpt: TravelSite, a platform born from a passion for travel, offers personalized destination guides and recommendations, transforming trip planning into an exciting and seamless experience.
author: Maria Revelo

headline: WeatherNow: Replicating Google's Weather App with a Twist
excerpt: WeatherNow, a project close to my heart, replicates the functionality of Google's weather app, providing real-time weather updates by integrating a live weather API for accuracy and fun.
author: Maria Revelo

headline: Reel Popcorn: A Popcorn Lover's Dream
excerpt: Popcorn in hand, our movie database is your digital ticket to a cinematic feast, offering a delectable spread of film insights, reviews, and recommendations to savor with every crunch
author: Pam Pragides, Maria Revelo, Alex Aguilar

headline: Hangman
excerpt: Test your word knowledge with this classic game of hangman, featuring a variety of words and difficulty levels to choose from.
author: Alex Aguilar

headline: Calculator
excerpt: Need a calculation done? Try this react made calculator. Able to handle all basic functionality.
author: Alex Aguilar
